snippet: A tiny State Department agency will be revamped and expanded to coordinate existing attempts to counter the Islamic State’s propaganda machine.
abstract: Center for Strategic Counterterrorism, small State Dept agency, is at center of Obama administration's plans to overhaul way that United States counteracts Islamic State's propaganda machine; administration is sponsoring days of meetings where it will showcase work already being done to combat group's propaganda on social media; overhaul is acknowledgement that too little has been done to slow ISIS's online momentum.
lead_paragraph: A tiny State Department agency will be revamped and expanded to coordinate existing attempts to counter the Islamic State’s propaganda machine.

headline.main: U.S. Intensifies Effort to Blunt ISIS’ Message
headline.print_headline: U.S. Intensifies Effort to Blunt ISIS’ Message

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
